long_description: Add some fun candy-colored stripes to your bike with Electra Candy handlebar grips. They slide easily onto the ends of your bike's straight-end handlebar for bright style and comfortable grip. Fits straight-end handlebars with ends that are 26.2mm in diameter. Grips can be used on handlebars that have trigger shifters; can also be used on handlebars with grip shifters if the grip shifter is moved over on the handlebar.
short_description: Add some fun candy-colored stripes to your bike with Electra Candy handlebar grips. They slide easily onto the ends of your bike's straight-end handlebar for bright style and comfortable grip.
